body:
This pull request adds var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/py-cgal-pybind, which is a package for bbpcode.epfl.ch/common/cgal-pybind [NSETM-1035].
    
The file py-cgal-pybind/package.py has been extracted from the existing branch
https://github.com/BlueBrain/spack/tree/cgal-pybind.

Once this pull request is merged into develop, 
the BBP python project nse/atlas-building-tools will be able to use cgal-pybind without a branch switch.
title: Add a package for cgal-pybind, a Python/C++ project from BBP (common/cgal_pybind)
